products.title: Rimini, Dove - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, dove - roller blind the rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quali
products.productdescription: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes. This is lovely when paired with brights in a kitchen or light woods in a living room.

products.title: Rimini, Almond - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, almond - roller blind the rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combi
products.productdescription: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

products.title: Rimini, Cream - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, cream - roller blind by embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and ca
products.productdescription: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together. Use it in the kitchen to help harmonise your country style decor, or how about in the living room where you want to keep the fireplace as the focal point of the room? The options really are endless.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini (blackout), cream - roller blind who'd have thought that a beautiful cream blind could work as a blackout blind? Well, the rimini (blackout) in cream does exactly that, all while offering its creamy paleness to any window. Perfect for the
products.productdescription: Who'd have thought that a beautiful cream blind could work as a blackout blind? Well, the rimini (blackout) in cream does exactly that, all while offering its creamy paleness to any window. Perfect for the bedroom or home office, this shade works wonderfully with vintage floral patterns, bold bright blues and greens, or dark, moody browns and greys. It fits equally well in a neutrally decorated room full of beiges and golds, or a pastel colour scheme full of pale pinks, dusky lilacs, or baby blues.
